title: Queen Specialist Hospital
name: Michael Goma
text: Service is professionally carried out there with patients getting care as soon as possible. For HMO patients the verification is seamless as long as your cover is valid you’re getting the care needed. Computerized process is also refreshing as you referred to various departments, your digital file is already there ahead of you. Overall, just the way you’d expect a modern health facility to operate. Kudos too to the relatively young and vibrant healthcare professionals over there 💪

title: Queen Specialist Hospital
name: Tholu Davies
text: Nice hospital, cool staff but they delay too much, if you're not a patient person; avoid that hospital please.

title: Queen Specialist Hospital
name: Magaji Victor
text: I had started with a wonderful experience but later had a bad ending. When I first arrived at the hospital, a woman in some uniform came to me and pleaded with me to bear with the delay as I waited longer than normal to see the doctor, she explained that the doctor was busy in the theatre. The doctor was such a nice and personable person. The hospital didn’t have the drugs I needed so the doctor wrote a referral and asked me to follow up with my HMO company, as I type this message, I have not received the drugs that I was told I would get within a maximum 2 hour time frame. The hospital is not taking calls, I’ve been calling since yesterday afternoon. The two stars rating I gave is only for the doctor and the woman that came to attend to me the beginning.

title: Queen Specialist Hospital
name: Marvin Chinda
text: Nice experience

title: Queen Specialist Hospital
name: Joy Princely Abutu
text: Such a neat environment, it can pass for a hotel. No funny hospital smell. Great and polite staff as well as experienced doctors who know what they are doing. Will definitely recommend this hospital to others.

title: Queen Specialist Hospital
name: chibuzo uzowuru
text: Nice Hospital with very friendly nurses, however, they need very experienced doctors. I keep meeting new doctors who seem inexperienced. Poor data management as they are always looking for patients folders. Need to switch to a digital means or more organized way of record keeping.

title: Queen Specialist Hospital
name: Onyishi malachi Ejike Nestor
text: Best Hospital in Abuja

title: Queen Specialist Hospital
name: Ruth Duru
text: Good

title: Queen Specialist Hospital
name: Adekunle Ogunlade
text: Very Clean, serene hospital i must say, friendly workers.

title: Queen Specialist Hospital
name: Amyk Amyk
text: QSH is a nice hospital with friendly nurses. It’s  also quite affordable. However, the staffs lack professionalism and well experienced medical practitioners. Imagine carrying a pint of blood in a tray publicly or giving BCG at birth without giving a card that tells you when next the child will be immunised and the likes or having just 2 nurses scheduled for a day.

title: Queen Specialist Hospital
name: Aysha Esq.
text: I love this hospital. Very professional and prompt in responding to patients. They'll also treat you accordingly. The nurses are super nice too.

title: Queen Specialist Hospital
name: Oyin Koleosho
text: Slow service. Long waiting or response period. Poor customer service. Manual documentation is embarrassing as they keep looking for patient's folder. Short skinny receptionist should be in the laundry room.

title: Queen Specialist Hospital
name: Ikenna Ugwumba
text: Clean facility. However, they need to consider switching to e-based data management and operations, this will help reduce the long wait time currently being experienced by clients.

title: Queen Specialist Hospital
name: PETER OBINNA
text: Clean and nice Hospital

title: Queen Specialist Hospital
name: FLORENCE BALOGUN DAVIDS
text:
The management should look into upgrading their system to a more recent state of the art equipment and procedures. Eg, manual BP checking equipment should be upgraded, the old pattern taking diagnosis in a file instead of in a computer should be upgraded.
The clinic can do better than what I saw.

title: Queen Specialist Hospital
name: Bukola Anetor
text: The CMD is a father! Very patient and understanding. Great at what he does too. Ambience is great but the nurses..... they need to do better. Some of them can be lazy!

title: Queen Specialist Hospital
name: lydia uko
text: Queens Specialist is the best I have seen in Abuja. Their service is the best 👍.

title: Queen Specialist Hospital
name: Deborah Gofwen
text: Nice place to be, professionalism at its peak.

title: Queen Specialist Hospital
name: Sulola Sere Dairo
text: My visit to the Hospital right from the reception desk to the consulting room through for the nurses gave me fantastic experience expected from a highly rated hospital.The level of responsiveness of the nurses to complaints is excellent. I had the feelings of being in safe hands.I will recommend the hospital to even those seeking medical treatment abroad.

title: Queen Specialist Hospital
name: Damilola Bamgbose
text: Queens Specialist is arguably one of the best hospital in Abuja. Equipped with state-of-the-art equipment. Customer service is great. The doctors and nurses are qualified, professional and courteous. Highly recommend!

title: Queen Specialist Hospital
name: Beautyandarteffect Make UP artistry
text:
A visit to Queens specialist hospital said it all the entire process from check in to the end was seamless. The staff at the health check department was courteous, helpful and very attentive. I would highly recommend this hospital to anyone looking for similar service.

Ebunoluwa Ojo

title: Queen Specialist Hospital
name: Zabeth C
text: A hospital filled with highly qualified doctors. Their service is wonderful!

title: Queen Specialist Hospital
name: Augustine Sere
text: I visited the hospital when I visited Nigeria from the US. To my surprise the hospital is up to international medical standard. The nurses are well trained, and they have excellent customer service. The doctors are very friendly and possessed excellent knowledge in their respective fields. I received excellent treatments. I will recommend Queens Specialist Hospital, in Abuja to my family members and friends.

title: Queen Specialist Hospital
name: Deji Arije
text: I'm impressed by the service level at this hospital. It's quite rare to find such in Nigeria. The staff here are courteous and very knowledgeable. I recommend this hospital to anyone who requires a doctor's attention while visiting Nigeria. I was told the owner trained in Europe. Special thanks for the care you gave and please continue the good work.

title: Queen Specialist Hospital
name: Leemavo
text: Love the "professionalism" I experienced, i would definitely recommend this hospital.

title: Queen Specialist Hospital
name: Lotenna Osanakpo
text: Prescribed inadequate anti depressants without no just cause and worsened my health and nearly cost me my life. Beware of this clinic.

title: Queen Specialist Hospital
name: Emmanuel Oloja
text: Quality care at it's finest, state of the art facilities and great ambience.staffs were very courteous, helpful and caring. Satisfied

title: Queen Specialist Hospital
name: R. JAURO
text: Good modern health facilities

title: Queen Specialist Hospital
name: Angela Sere Ejembi
text: Peak of the pack equipment and service delivery.  Very impressive.

title: Queen Specialist Hospital
name: SocketWaves
text: Newly built facility with adequate equipment
